title: Video Lists & Search
description: Implement video browsing with search, filters, and collapsible sections

todos.title: Create basic VideoList component
todos.description: Build flat list view for videos with basic info
tasks: Show progress indicators and completion status
Make video items clickable for playback
todos.completion_criteria: Video list displays all video information clearly

todos.title: Implement CollapsibleVideoList
todos.description: Add collapsible sections for better organization
tasks: Group videos by sections (e.g., 10 videos per section)
todos.completion_criteria: Videos are organized in collapsible sections with good performance

todos.title: Add search and filtering
tasks: Add search input with debounced queries
Add completion status filters (all, completed, in-progress, not-started)
Persist search state in URL params
todos.completion_criteria: Search and filters work smoothly with good UX

todos.title: Add sorting capabilities
todos.description: Allow users to sort videos by different criteria
tasks: Add sort by last watched date
todos.completion_criteria: Users can sort videos by various criteria

todos.title: Enhanced progress visualization
todos.description: Add detailed progress indicators and badges
tasks: Create progress bars for individual videos
Add notes indicators (badges for videos with notes)
todos.completion_criteria: Progress is clearly visible throughout the video lists

todos.title: Optimize for mobile devices
todos.description: Ensure video lists work well on mobile
tasks: Test responsive layout on mobile sizes
todos.completion_criteria: Video lists are fully functional and performant on mobile

test_strategy: Test search performance, filter combinations, sorting, and mobile responsiveness
